Contains cruise data for underway physical oceanography and CO2 measurements.

kitidis2017.tsv - Data are from a single cruise in the SOCAT dataset.
Kitidis, Vassilis; Brown, Ian (2017): Underway physical oceanography and carbon dioxide measurements during James Clark Ross cruise 74JC20131009. Plymouth Marine Laboratory, PANGAEA, https://doi.org/10.1594/PANGAEA.878492,
Downloaded URL: https://doi.pangaea.de/10.1594/PANGAEA.878492
SOCAT expocode: 74JC20131009
